overview:
Social CRM 2.0

A cloud-based candidate engagement and management platform, TalentCircles allows companies to create, brand, manage, and own their private turnkey talent networks and subnetworks (circles). Using TalentCircles, recruiters can: • Interact with candidates via voice, video, events, chat, individual emails, email campaigns, webinars, and announcements as they wish. • Efficiently manage live talent pools. • Reduce hiring costs and optimally fill positions with candidates who have already opted to become familiar with the company’s culture.

TalentCircles is the missing link between sourcing and job applicant tracking systems. The platform streamlines the candidate engagement process between the time a candidate shows interest in the company and the time he/she applies for a job.
